path: Referenced Material/Reference Library/Vendor/Evertz/Evertz/Maximum Widgets per VIP10G.docx
text: Maximum Widgets per VIP-10G Max video windows = 72 Max UMD = 400 per card Max Text Label = 800 per card Max Status Label = 400 per card Max Tally = 400 per card Max Audio Bar = 144 per card Max Analog/ Digital Â Clock = 20 per card Max Digital Clock = 256 Max Graphic = total number of displays supported by the VIP Total number of UMDs + Text Labels + Tallies + Digital Clocks cannot exceed 800.
